content: I've been (slowly) getting more involved in working on the compiler lately, and I just wanted to say thanks to everyone who has contributed to the dev guide. It's an amazing resource, with so many helpful summaries, tips, etc. It really does make it much easier to get involved with the compiler. :big_smile:
I'll make sure to contribute things I happen to discover that might help others as well.
thank you so much :heart: it's great to know it helps :)
It's quite rewarding to get messages like this :smile: When we started almost 3 years ago, i had no idea it would grow so much!

J. Ryan Stinnett said:

I've been (slowly) getting more involved in working on the compiler lately, and I just wanted to say thanks to everyone who has contributed to the dev guide. It's an amazing resource, with so many helpful summaries, tips, etc. It really does make it much easier to get involved with the compiler. :big_smile:

thanks for your words :)
